00031 
00032 // -------
00033 // destroy
00034 // -------
00035 
00036 template <typename A, typename BI>
00037 BI destroy (A& a, BI b, BI e) {
00038     while (b != e) {
00039         --e;
00040         a.destroy(&*e);}
00041     return b;}
00042 
00043 // ------------------
00044 // uninitialized_copy
00045 // ------------------
00046 
00047 template <typename A, typename II, typename BI>
00048 BI uninitialized_copy (A& a, II b, II e, BI x) {
00049     BI p = x;
00050     try {
00051         while (b != e) {
00052             a.construct(&*x, *b);
00053             ++b;
00054             ++x;}}
00055     catch (...) {
00056         destroy(a, p, x);
00057         throw;}
00058     return x;}
00059 
00060 // ------------------
00061 // uninitialized_fill
00062 // ------------------
00063 
00064 template <typename A, typename BI, typename U>
00065 BI uninitialized_fill (A& a, BI b, BI e, const U& v) {
00066     BI p = b;
00067     try {
00068         while (b != e) {
00069             a.construct(&*b, v);
00070             ++b;}}
00071     catch (...) {
00072         destroy(a, p, b);
00073         throw;}
00074     return e;}

00101         // operator ==
00102         // -----------
00103 
00107         friend bool operator == (const Deque& lhs, const Deque& rhs) {
00108             if(!lexicographical_compare(lhs.begin(), lhs.end(), rhs.begin(), rhs.end()) &&
00109               !lexicographical_compare(rhs.begin(), rhs.end(), lhs.begin(), lhs.end())){
00110                   return true;
00111             }
00112             return false;}
00113 
00114         // ----------
00115         // operator <
00116         // ----------
00117 
00121         friend bool operator < (const Deque& lhs, const Deque& rhs) {
00122             return lexicographical_compare(lhs._front, lhs._back, rhs._front, rhs._back);}

00490         explicit Deque (const allocator_type& a = allocator_type()) {
00491             _a = a;
00492             ROWS = 10;
00493             tsize = ROWS;
00494             container = _a.allocate(ROWS);
00495             _size = 0;
00496             _front = container + (ROWS / 2);
00497             _back = _front;
00498             assert(valid());}
00499 
00503         explicit Deque (size_type s, const_reference v = value_type(), const allocator_type& a = allocator_type()) {
00504             _a = a;
00505             _size = s;
00506             ROWS = 10;
00507             tsize = ROWS * (((_size / ROWS) + 1) * 2);
00508             if(s > 5)
00509                 container = _a.allocate(tsize);
00510             else
00511                 container = _a.allocate(ROWS);
00512 
00513             _front = container + (tsize / 2);
00514             _back = _front + _size;
00515 
00516             uninitialized_fill(_a, _front, _back, v);
00517 /*
00518             for(int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
00519                 if(s == 0)
00520                     break;
00521                 *our_back = v;
00522                 our_back++;
00523                 s--;
00524             }
00525 
00526             int tmp = 1;
00527             while(s > 10) {
00528                 container[(ROWS / 2) + tmp] = a.allocate(COLUMNS);
00529                 fill(container[(ROWS / 2) + tmp], container[(ROWS / 2) + tmp] + COLUMNS, v);
00530                 s -= 10;
00531                 tmp++;
00532             }
00533 
00534             our_back = container[(ROWS / 2) + tmp][0];
00535 
00536             while(s > 0) {
00537                 *our_back = v;
00538                 our_back++;
00539                 s--;
00540             }
00541 */
00542             assert(valid());}

00547         Deque (const Deque& that) {
00548             _a = that._a;
00549             ROWS = that.ROWS;
00550             container = _a.allocate(that.tsize);
00551             tsize = that.tsize;
00552             int offset = that._front - that.container;
00553             _front = container + offset;
00554             _back = uninitialized_copy(_a, that._front, that._back, _front);
00555             _size = that._size;
00556             assert(valid());}
00557 
00558         // ----------
00559         // destructor
00560         // ----------
00561 
00565         ~Deque () {
00566             destroy(_a, _front, _back);
00567             _a.deallocate(container, tsize);
00568             assert(valid());}
00569 
00570         // ----------
00571         // operator =
00572         // ----------
00573 
00577         Deque& operator = (const Deque& rhs) {
00578             _a = rhs._a;
00579             ROWS = rhs.ROWS;
00580             container = _a.allocate(rhs.tsize);
00581             tsize = rhs.tsize;
00582             int offset = rhs._front - rhs.container;
00583             _front = container + offset;
00584             _back = uninitialized_copy(_a, rhs._front, rhs._back, _front);
00585             _size = rhs._size;
00586             assert(valid());
00587             return *this;}

00660         void clear () {
00661             destroy(_a, _front, _back);
00662             _front = container + (tsize / 2);
00663             _back = _front;
00664             _size = 0;
00665             assert(valid());}

00693         // -----
00694         // erase
00695         // -----
00696 
00700         iterator erase (iterator it) {
00701             _a.destroy(&*it);
00702             if(it == _front)
00703             {
00704                 ++it;
00705                 ++_front;
00706             }
00707             else if(it == _back - 1)
00708             {
00709                 --it;
00710                 --_back;
00711             }
00712             else
00713             {
00714                 iterator temp = it;
00715                 while(!(temp == _back - 1))
00716                 {
00717                     *temp = *(temp + 1);
00718                     temp++;
00719                 }
00720                 _a.destroy(&*temp);
00721                 _back--;
00722             }
00723             _size--;
00724             assert(valid());
00725             return it;}
00726

00743         // ------
00744         // insert
00745         // ------
00746 
00750         iterator insert (iterator it, const_reference v) {
00751             iterator temp = it;
00752             if(_size == tsize)
00753             {
00754                 resize(tsize * 2);
00755             }
00756             if(_front == it)
00757             {
00758                 push_front(v);
00759                 temp = it - 1;
00760             }
00761             else if(_back == it)
00762             {
00763                 push_back(v);
00764                 temp = it;
00765             } 
00766             else 
00767             {
00768                 if(!(_back == (container + tsize))){
00769                     temp = _back;
00770                     while(!(temp == it)){
00771                         *temp = *(temp - 1);
00772                         --temp;
00773                     }
00774                     *temp = v;
00775                     ++_size;
00776                     ++_back;
00777                 } else {
00778                     iterator temp = _front - 1;
00779                     while(!(temp == it)){
00780                         *temp = *(temp + 1);
00781                         ++temp;
00782                     }
00783                     *temp = v;
00784                     ++_size;
00785                     --_front;
00786                 }
00787             }
00788             assert(valid());
00789             return iterator(&*temp);}

00791         // ---
00792         // pop
00793         // ---
00794 
00798         void pop_back () {
00799             _a.destroy(_back-1);
00800             --_back;
00801             --_size;
00802             assert(valid());}
00803 
00807         void pop_front () {
00808             _a.destroy(_front);
00809             ++_front;
00810             --_size;
00811             assert(valid());}
00812 
00813         // ----
00814         // push
00815         // ----
00816 
00820         void push_back (const_reference v) {
00821             if(_size == tsize)
00822             {
00823               resize(tsize * 2);
00824             }
00825             if(_back == (container + tsize))
00826             {
00827               iterator temp = _front - 1;
00828               while(!(temp == _back))
00829               {
00830                 *temp = *(temp + 1);
00831                 temp++;
00832               }
00833               *temp = v;
00834               _front--;
00835             }
00836             else
00837             {
00838               *(_back) = v;
00839               _back++;
00840             }
00841             _size++;
00842             assert(valid());}
00843 
00847         void push_front (const_reference v) {
00848             if(_size == tsize)
00849             {
00850                 resize(tsize * 2);
00851             }
00852             if(_front == container)
00853             {
00854                 iterator temp = _back;
00855                 while(!(temp == _front))
00856                 {
00857                     *temp = *(temp - 1);
00858                     temp--;
00859                 }
00860                 *temp = v;
00861                 _back++;
00862             }
00863             else
00864             {
00865                 *(_front - 1) = v;
00866                 _front--;
00867             }
00868             _size++;
00869             assert(valid());}
00870 
00871         // ------
00872         // resize
00873         // ------
00874 
00878         void resize (size_type s, const_reference v = value_type()) {
00879             if(s == _size)
00880                 return;
00881             else if(s < _size)
00882             {
00883                 _back = destroy(_a, _front + s, _back);
00884                 _size = s;
00885             }
00886             else if(s <= tsize)
00887             {
00888                 _front = (container + ((tsize - _size)/2));
00889                 _back = _front + s;
00890                 _back = uninitialized_fill(_a, _front, _back, v);
00891                 _size = s;
00892             }
00893             else
00894             {
00895                 if(s > (2 * _size))
00896                 {
00897                     Deque nDeque (s, v);
00898                     swap(nDeque);
00899                 }
00900                 else
00901                 {
00902                     Deque nDeque (2 * _size, v);
00903                     swap(nDeque);
00904                 }
00905             }
00906             assert(valid());}
00907 
00908         // ----
00909         // size
00910         // ----
00911 
00915         size_type size () const {
00916             return _size;}
00917 
00918         // ----
00919         // swap
00920         // ----
00921 
00925         void swap (Deque& that) {
00926           if (_a == that._a) {
00927             std::swap(_front, that._front);
00928             std::swap(_back, that._back);
00929             std::swap(container, that.container);
00930             int temp = tsize;
00931             tsize = that.tsize;
00932             that.tsize = temp;
00933             temp = _size;
00934             _size = that._size;
00935             that._size = temp;}
00936           else {
00937             Deque x(*this);
00938             *this = that;
00939             that = x;}
00940             assert(valid());}};
